question: Tùi 2007 kàu 2008, Lîn (Oil) he̍k NGL nn̄g chióng sán-phín, chhùn-siau-liōng (production/sales volume) sī siáng tō tńg--khì khah chē ê tō͘?
2008 niรก Chhit-la̍k hē-chí ê iû kah NGL ê chóng seng-sán/bē-chhut tōa-sè (mbbls)?
Jī-tang-nî tī iû-liû bē-chhut (Oil sales) tit-tio̍h koh khah koân ê sǹg-thāi liû-chha̍h (calculated total revenue)?
Chiu chong-chong ê siū-tio̍h ê kóo-sòo (khah chē chē téng-túi ê sán-phín ê kóo-sòo) tùi 2007 kàu 2008 chiūⁿ-thiⁿ, iáⁿ-bē ū sìⁿ-mih ê piàn-tōa?
answer: Sóo ū ê sió-sòo kóo-sòo ê siū-tio̍h ê kóo-sòo lóng-chóng ū cheng-tōa, tùi 2007 kàu 2008 lóng cheng-tōa. Khí-iû ê kóo-sòo tùi $5.95 cheng-tōa kàu $8.25 chi̍t ê mcf, Chio̍h-iû ê kóo-sòo tùi $83.37 cheng-tōa kàu $95.26 chi̍t ê bbl, chiâⁿ chē chē ê NGL kóo-sòo tùi $51.02 cheng-tōa chió-chió kàu $51.26 chi̍t ê bbl.

question: Oa-ha̍t Kàu 2008 nî ê sêng-sán/bōt-chhut liōng pí 2007 nî koh koh khah-chē 2.25 pái ê sêng-sán/bōt-chhut lūi-hêng ū siáⁿ-kóa?
2008 nî ê 'equivalent production (bcfe)' tuī 'gas production (bcf)' ê chiàⁿ chiap bô-mén bôa-chéng-tōa?
Nāi-sī 2008-nî ê io̍h-chí li̍p-téng sîng-pâi kàng-kòe 15%, chio̍h-chāi kò-siâⁿ-ê io̍h-chí bōe-báⁿ ê sêng-pâi ē kàng-chōe kúi-ā-ê (bān-gôan-bâⁿ)?
Tńg-tiâu-liâm ê piàn-hoà, tû-liáu kóan-îng-ê si̍t-phín ê seng-sán/bōi-chhut liōng kah tiong-kau sîng-pún kî-kan ū siáⁿ-mih bīn-téng ê koan-hē?
answer: Tùi 2007 chì 2008 nî, só͘-ū tû-liáu kóan-îng-ê si̍t-phín lóng ū chi̍t-ê kòan-sû ê tīn-tāi koan-liân. Tī múi chi̍t ê chêng-hêng (Khì, NGL, kah Iû), tùi 2007 chì 2008 nî, seng-sán/bōi-chhut liōng ê tōa-tōa-ê cheng-tiông kah tiong-kau sîng-pún ê cheng-tiông tâng-sî tńg-lâi, chí-tō chhut tī chit ê sî-kî, kiông-le̍k ê chhī-tiûⁿ cheng-tō chiū-sī liōng kah kâi siâng tōaⁿ chhoāⁿ.

question: 2008 kah 2007 lia̍h tiong, ūi-sū chi̍t-ê bô-tiāⁿ-á ū sò͘-jī tû-liáu ê keh-chha̍h (row) ê bûn-jī sī siá siáⁿ-mih?
answer: average realized prices without hedging results:

question: Chiah-ê seng-sán/bē-chhut, pau-koà 'tūi-túi' ê kè-liōng, tī 2007 chì 2008 nî ū siáⁿ-chē chiáⁿ-kóe tōa ê cheng-tiâu (pài-phiah-tōa to̍h-chú)?
2008 nî, ol kap NGL ê siong-kè sán-liōng sī sián-me?
